department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
short_summary: REQUEST FOR INFORMATION AS TO THE AVAILABILITY OF PARKING SPACE FOR LEASE IN THE CITY OF OTTAWA
description: Please consult the attached PDF for details
full_summary:
### Request for Information: Parking Space for Lease in Ottawa
#### Request Title
*English*: Request for Information as to the Availability of Parking Space for Lease in the City of Ottawa
*French*: Demande de Renseignements sur la Disponibilité d'Espace de Stationnement pour Location dans la Ville d'Ottawa

#### Tender Details
*Reference Number*: CFR/RFI-2023-2
*Amendment Number*: 6
*Publication Date*: December 1, 2023
*Tender Closing Date*: January 12, 2024, 11:59 PM EST
*Expected Contract Start Date*: May 1, 2024
*Expected Contract End Date*: May 31, 2042

#### Procurement Details
*Procurement Category*: SRV (Services)
*Procurement Method*: Competitive - Selective Tendering
*Notice Type*: Request for Information
*Regions of Opportunity*: Ottawa, National Capital Region (NCR)

#### Contact Information
*Contracting Entity*: PWGSC
*Contact Person*: Mathieu Bradley
*Email*: [mathieu.bradley@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:mathieu.bradley@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
*Phone*: (819) 712-8838

#### Documents
*PDF Document*: Attached to this notice
*Language*: [English](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/26040/ddr_rfi-2023-2-en.pdf) | [French](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/26040/ddr_rfi-2023-2-fr.pdf)
